title: "GG   GG   GG....... (etc etc) " scripting at end of game
body:
I'm a little concerned at how many scripters I am seeing in ranked chat at the end of the game. 

Is anyone else???

I will screenshot everyone and attach to my support ticket. if they so lazy with the typing, whats to say they aren't lazy with their game play too.

makes me so angry

replies.body:
It's called macros.

And it's not against the rules to use it.

Not against the rules to use macros is true.

However spam is against the rules.
cry more ....... who cares doesn't hurt anyone
^ This is the most toxic server after all.
Yeah all the 'GG' spam you see whether it be in game chat or post game chat is just a preset macro that people can activate at the press of a button. Scripting is vastly different.

When you see your Korean cousin playing LoL. 

First thing they do in-game is mute everyone.

And there's me: "gotta note that down".

I literally just have a macro bound to my mouse that spams "stop talking in all chat, no one cares"  for when people start getting in pointless arguments with the enemy team
It doesn't hurt anyone, so I don't see the problem.
